abstract_ssm: This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony on January 20, 1988. Ahmet Ertegun introduces Les Paul -- Les Paul video montage --Jeff Beck inducts Les Paul -- Les Paul acceptance speech -- Jann Wenner introduces The Beach Boys -- The Beach Boys video montage -- Elton John inducts The Beach Boys -- The Beach Boys acceptance speech -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces The Drifters -- The Drifters video montage -- Billy Joel inducts The Drifters -- The Drifters acceptance speech -- Jann Wenner introduces Bob Dylan -- Bob Dylan video montage
